title: Micrometer metrics common tags missing
body:
### Describe the bug

As per documentation given in https://quarkus.io/guides/micrometer
using below class for Using MeterFilter to configure metrics

```
@Singleton
public class NexusMetrics {
    /** Define common tags that apply globally */
    @Produces
    @Singleton
    public MeterFilter configureAllRegistries() {
        return MeterFilter.commonTags(Arrays.asList(
                Tag.of("env", "testing")));
    }

}
```   


### Expected behavior

All metrics should have tags named env

### Actual behavior

all below metrics doesn't have common tag

```
# HELP agroal_blocking_time_average_milliseconds Average time an application waited to acquire a connection.
# TYPE agroal_blocking_time_average_milliseconds gauge
agroal_blocking_time_average_milliseconds{datasource="default",} 32.0
# HELP jvm_buffer_count_buffers An estimate of the number of buffers in the pool
# TYPE jvm_buffer_count_buffers gauge
jvm_buffer_count_buffers{id="mapped - 'non-volatile memory'",} 0.0
jvm_buffer_count_buffers{id="mapped",} 0.0
jvm_buffer_count_buffers{id="direct",} 13.0
# HELP jvm_classes_loaded_classes The number of classes that are currently loaded in the Java virtual machine
# TYPE jvm_classes_loaded_classes gauge
jvm_classes_loaded_classes 11024.0
# HELP agroal_awaiting_count Approximate number of threads blocked, waiting to acquire a connection.
# TYPE agroal_awaiting_count gauge
agroal_awaiting_count{datasource="default",} 0.0
# HELP http_server_bytes_written_max Number of bytes sent by the server
# TYPE http_server_bytes_written_max gauge
http_server_bytes_written_max 12288.0
# HELP http_server_bytes_written Number of bytes sent by the server

# HELP jvm_gc_overhead_percent An approximation of the percent of CPU time used by GC activities over the last lookback period or since monitoring began, whichever is shorter, in the range [0..1]
# TYPE jvm_gc_overhead_percent gauge
jvm_gc_overhead_percent 0.0
```

### How to Reproduce?

1. add below dependency 
```
<dependency>
    <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
    <artifactId>quarkus-micrometer-registry-prometheus</artifactId>
</dependency>
```
2. build project mvn clean package

3. hit any resource configured. 


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.1" 2021-10-19 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Homebrew (build 17.0.1+1) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Homebrew (build 17.0.1+1, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

NA

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.16.4.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.2 (ea98e05a04480131370aa0c110b8c54cf726c06f) Maven home: /Users/shiva/Documents/apache-maven-3.8.2 Java version: 17.0.1, vendor: Homebrew, runtime: /usr/local/Cellar/openjdk/17.0.1_1/libexec/openjdk.jdk/Contents/Home Default locale: en_IN, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "mac os x", version: "12.3.1", arch: "x86_64", family: "mac"

### Additional information

Not just common tag. None of customisation of metrics is working.
like mentioned in offical documentation : https://micrometer.io/docs/concepts#_meter_filters
